Entries.Rainy_Day_Shane: The roof's leaking? Ah well... a little mould never hurt anyone.
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: The rain makes our home seem so cosy.$h^It's nights like this I'm glad we have a quality roof.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hi, honey! Smells good, doesn't it? I made you breakfast! [194 195 210 211 216]#$e#You need food to stay energised throughout the day.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Did you sleep well?#$e#I've got some housework to do in here.
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Good morning, dear. Another day of farm work, huh?#$e#I'll be cheering for you. <$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_Maru: If you ever want to talk about how to maximise crop yield or anything... I'm open to that!
Entries.Indoor_Day_Alex: The sun's shining and I'm bursting with energy! You'd better watch out! Heheh.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_Sam: There's too much stuff I want to get done today... Maybe I'll just watch telly instead.
Entries.Indoor_Day_Shane: There's something special in the air... *sniff*... what is that? Oh...#$b#It's just this old crisp I put in my pocket a few weeks ago. *crunch*
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Did you get everything done today, @?#$e#I did some housework... but now I'm so tired.#$e#I'm ready for bed whenever you are.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: *phew*! I just finished my housework. Now we can spend some time together.$h#$e#So, tell me about your day.$l#$e#...$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_Emily: It's a very cosy house... I like it.
Entries.TwoKids_0: I've already given %kid1 and %kid2 their breakfast. They were hungry!
Entries.Neutral_0: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and grey.$s
Entries.Neutral_1: Do you think your {{Lowercase: {{GrandparentName}}}} would be proud of the work we've done?
Entries.spring_23: I hope you've been practising your moves... tomorrow is the flower dance!
Entries.summer_Haley: You must know by now that summer is my favourite season.$h
Entries.fall_Sebastian: My mother used to always make this delicious pumpkin soup in autumn.
Entries.fall_Elliott: Ah... autumn. The warm sun drifts low in the sky, casting long shadows over waving fields of gold.#$e#It's a beautiful time of year, don't you think?
Entries.spouseRoom_Sam: #$c .5#The old guitar... I don't have as much drive to play it any more. That's fine.#$e#What's on your agenda today?
